logic.figure

Class FigureThief

  • java.lang.Object
    • logic.figure.AFigure
      • logic.figure.FigureThief
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAFigure, IFigureThief

    public class FigureThief
extends AFigure
implements IFigureThief
    This class holds specific information about a thief figure in the game.

    3.0
    Author:
    Fabian R.

        Parameters:
        owner - owner of the figure
        figureID - figure identification integer
        position - start position on the map
        tokens - start tokens, ticket types as identifier and number of this type as value
        icon - figure icon
